issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Use logical types in Arrow writer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11824](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11824). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Start using the logical type for Arrow <> Parquet schema conversion, so that we can support more Arrow types, like nanosecond temporal types.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11824?focusedCommentId=17304726) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9612
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9612>
